beer.beer_description: Golden in colour, crowned with a full white head from the wheat added with wonderful orange peel and citrus aromas and flavours. Full of flavour; with all the chilled refreshment of a lager.

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 345 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 70!

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 125 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 26!

items.checkin_comment: [RB 2.8 01/04/14] Blonde pale, assez plate, pas de mousse. Nez : un peu de malt, légèrement houblonnée : senteur d’agrumes. Amertume moyenne, pas de corps, plate, goût pas désagréable d’agrumes mais fadasse.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 90 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 19!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 10! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
